craftable.name: ArcaneGauntlet
craftable.add_attrs: Ability can critically strike.

radiant.name: RadientJeweledGauntlet
radiant.add_attrs: Abilities can critically strike.

craftable.name: Bloodthirster
craftable.add_attrs:
Grant 20% Omnivamp.

Once per combat: at 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

radiant.name: RadientBloodthirster
radiant.add_attrs:
Gain 40% Omnivamp.

Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 40% max Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

craftable.name: BlueSentinel
craftable.add_attrs:
Max mana reduce by 10.

If the holder gets a takedown within 3 seconds of casting, gain 10 Mana.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

radiant.name: RadientBlueBuff
radiant.add_attrs:
Max mana reduced by 10.

If the holder gets at least 1 takedown within 3 seconds of casting, gain 20 Mana.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craftable.name: BrambleVest
craftable.add_attrs:
Negates 50% bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. When struck by an attack, deal 75/100/150 ★ magic damage to all adjacent enemies

Cooldown: 2 seconds

radiant.name: RadientBrambleVest
radiant.add_attrs:
Negates 70% bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. On being hit by an attack, deal 125/175/225★ magic damage to all adjacent enemies.

Cooldown: 2 seconds

craftable.name: DragonsClaw
craftable.add_attrs: Every 2 seconds, heal 5% max Health.

radiant.name: RadientDragonsClaw
radiant.add_attrs: Every 2 seconds, regenerate 10% maximum Health.

craftable.name: Fimbulwinter
craftable.add_attrs: Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds and gain 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resist.

radiant.name: FimbulwinterRadiant
radiant.add_attrs: Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 50% max Health shield that lasts 10 seconds and gain 60 Armor and Magic Resist.

craftable.name: GiantSlayer
craftable.add_attrs: Deal 25% more damage to enemies with more than 1600 maximum Health.

radiant.name: RadientGiantSlayer
radiant.add_attrs: Deal 60% more damage to enemies with more than 1600 max Health.

craftable.name: Guardbreaker
craftable.add_attrs: After damaging a shielded, deal 25% more damage for 3 seconds.

radiant.name: RadientStridebreaker
radiant.add_attrs: After damaging a shielded enemy, Abilities and attacks 50% deal more damage for 3 seconds.

craftable.name: GuardianAngel
craftable.add_attrs:
Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects. Then, gain 15% bonus Attack Speed.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

radiant.name: RadientEdgeofNight
radiant.add_attrs:
Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects. Then, heal 100% missing health and gain 85% bonus Attack Speed.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craftable.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craftable.add_attrs: Attacks grant 4% stacking Attack Speed.

radiant.name: RadientGuinsoosRageblade
radiant.add_attrs: Attacks grant +8% bonus Attack Speed. This effect stacks.

craftable.name: HandofJustice
craftable.add_attrs:
Grant 2 effects:
- +15% Attack Damage and +15 Ability Power.
- 15% Omnivamp.

Each round, randomly double 1 of these effects.

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

radiant.name: RadientHandofJustice
radiant.add_attrs:
Gain 2 effects:
+50% Attack Damage and +50 Ability Power.
30% Omnivamp.

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

craftable.name: HextechGunblade
craftable.add_attrs:
Grant 22% Omnivamp. Which also heals the lowest percent Health ally

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

radiant.name: RadientHextechGunblade
radiant.add_attrs: The holder's damage heal them for 35% of the damage dealt. The holder also heals their lowest health ally for the same amount.

craftable.name: InfinityEdge
craftable.add_attrs: Ability can critically strike.

radiant.name: RadientInfinityEdge
radiant.add_attrs: Damage from an Ability can critically strike.

craftable.name: IonicSpark
craftable.add_attrs:
30% Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 160% of their maximum Mana.

Shred: reduce Magic Resist

radiant.name: RadientIonicSpark
radiant.add_attrs:
30% Shred enemies within 3 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 250% of their maximum Mana.

Also, regenerate 1.5% maximum Health per second.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

craftable.name: IronWill
craftable.add_attrs: Grant 10 Armor and 10 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

radiant.name: RadientGargoyleStoneplate
radiant.add_attrs:
Grant 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting holder.

Also, regenerate 2% maximum Health each second.

craftable.name: LastWhisper
craftable.add_attrs:
Physical damage 30% Sunders the target for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Sunder: reduce Armor

radiant.name: RadientLastWhisper
radiant.add_attrs:
Any physical damage dealt the 30% Sunders the target for the rest of combat. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - only one per champion]
Sunder: reduce Armor

craftable.name: LordsEdge
craftable.add_attrs: Perfect peace and calm for the holder - and all who face it.

radiant.name: RadientDeathblade
radiant.add_attrs: It glows in the presence of enemies. Or friends. Or anything alive, really.

craftable.name: LudensEcho
craftable.add_attrs: Combat start: Grant 25 Ability Power every 5 seconds.

radiant.name: RadientArchangelsStaff
radiant.add_attrs: Combat start: Gain 35 Ability Power every 4 seconds.

craftable.name: Morellonomicon
craftable.add_attrs:
Ability damage deals 1% Burns and 33% Wounds enemies for 10 seconds.

[Unique - Only 1 Per Champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

radiant.name: RadientMorellonomicon
radiant.add_attrs:
Damage from the holder's Ability 2% Burns and 33% Wounds enemies for 30 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craftable.name: Quicksilver
craftable.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant immunity to crowd control for 18 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

radiant.name: RadientQuicksilver
radiant.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant immunity to crowd control for 30 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craftable.name: RabadonsDeathcap
craftable.add_attrs: This humble hat can help you make, or unmake, the world itself.

radiant.name: RadientRabadonsDeathcap
radiant.add_attrs: It's witnessed - and unleashed - miracles and calamities both.

craftable.name: RapidFirecannon
craftable.add_attrs:
Deal 8% bonus damage.

Grant 1 bonus Attack Range.

radiant.name: RadientRapidFirecannon
radiant.add_attrs:
Deal 15% bonus damage.

Grant 2 bonus Attack Range.

craftable.name: Redemption
craftable.add_attrs: Heal allies within 1 hex for 15% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also take 10% less damage for 5 seconds (damage reduction does not stack).

radiant.name: RadientRedemption
radiant.add_attrs: Heal allies within 2 hexes for 25% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also take 10% less damage for 5 seconds (damage reduction does not stack).

craftable.name: RunaansHurricane
craftable.add_attrs: Attack fire a bolt at neaby enemy, dealing 50% Attack Damage as physical damage.

radiant.name: RadientRunaansHurricane
radiant.add_attrs: Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing 100% Attack Damage as physical damage.

craftable.name: SpearofShojin
craftable.add_attrs: Attacks grant 5 bonus Mana.

radiant.name: RadientSpearofShojin
radiant.add_attrs: Attack restore 10 additional Mana.

craftable.name: StatikkShiv
craftable.add_attrs:
Every 3rd attack deal 30 magic damage and 30% Shreds 4 enemies for 5 seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

radiant.name: RadientStatikkShiv
radiant.add_attrs:
Every 3rd attack deals 70 magic damage and 30% Shreds 8 enemies for 5 seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

craftable.name: SunfireCape
craftable.add_attrs:
Every 2 seconds, an enemy within 2 hexes is 1% Burned and 33% Wounded for 10 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

radiant.name: RadientSunfireCape
radiant.add_attrs:
Every 1.5 seconds, deal 2% Burn and 33% Wound to an enemy within 3 hexes for 30 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second
Wound: reduces healing received

craftable.name: ThiefsGloves
craftable.add_attrs:
Each round: Equip 2 random items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

radiant.name: RadientThiefsGloves
radiant.add_attrs:
Each round: Equip 2 random Radiant items.

[Consumes 3 item slots]

craftable.name: TitansResolve
craftable.add_attrs:
Grant 2% Attack Damage and 2 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times.

At full stacks, gain 20 Armor and Magic Resist.

radiant.name: RadientTitansResolve
radiant.add_attrs:
Grant 3% Attack Damage 3 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times.

At full stacks, gain 50 Armor and Magic Resist.

craftable.name: WarmogsArmor
craftable.add_attrs: Tough as teak, strong as oak, and eternal as petricite.

radiant.name: RadientWarmogsArmor
radiant.add_attrs: Regenerate 1% max Health per second.

craftable.name: NashorsTooth
craftable.add_attrs: After casting an Ability, gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

radiant.name: NashorsToothRadiant
radiant.add_attrs: After casting an Ability, gain 60% Attack Speed for 8 seconds. Attack Speed is applied after the holder's cast time completes.

craftable.name: AdaptiveHelm
craftable.add_attrs:
Combat Start: The holder gains bonuses based on their starting position.

Front Two Rows: 30 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 1 Mana when struck by an attack.

Back Two Rows: 15 Ability Power. Gain 10 Mana every 3 seconds.

radiant.name: JakshotheProtean
radiant.add_attrs:
Combat Start: The holder gains two effects, regardless of starting position.

Front Two Rows: 45 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 1 Mana when struck by an attack.

Back Two Rows: 45 Ability Power. Gain 15 Mana every 3 seconds.

craftable.name: SteraksGage
craftable.add_attrs: Once per combat at 60% Health, gain  20% max Health and 35% Attack Damage.

radiant.name: SteraksMegashield
radiant.add_attrs: Once per combat at 60% Health, increase max health by 30% and gain 55% Attack Damage for the rest of combat.

craftable.name: Evenshroud
craftable.add_attrs:
30% Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Grant 20 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 10 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

radiant.name: EvenshroudRadiant
radiant.add_attrs:
30% Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Grant 50 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 15 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

craftable.name: NightHarvester
craftable.add_attrs: Deal 12% bonus damage. After falling below 60% Health, increase this to 30% for the rest of combat.

radiant.name: NightHarvesterRadiant
radiant.add_attrs: Deal 20% bonus damage. After falling below 20% Health, increase this to 45% for the rest of combat.

craftable.name: Crownguard
craftable.add_attrs:
Combat start: Shields the holder for 30% of their max health for 8 seconds.
When the shield breaks or expires, gain 35 Ability Power.

radiant.name: CrownguardRadiant
radiant.add_attrs: Combat start: Gain a 40% max health Shield for 8 seconds. When the shield expires, gain 50 Ability Power.
